titleStmt.title: Bogg-witticisms, or, Dear joy's common-places being a compleat collection of the most profound punns, learned bulls, elaborate quibbles, and wise sayings of some of the natives of Teague-Land / ... coullected bee de grete caare and painsh-tauking of oour laurned countree-maun, Mac O Bonnielabbero of Drogheda, Knight of the Mendicant Order.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Evidansh swear-all in Lack-Plaush Lane,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
